data.Title: Annihilation
data.Genre: Adventure, Drama, Horror, Mystery, Sci-Fi, Thriller
data.Writer: Alex Garland (written for the screen by), Jeff VanderMeer (based on the novel by)
data.Actors: Natalie Portman, Benedict Wong, Sonoya Mizuno, David Gyasi
data.Plot: A biologist signs up for a dangerous, secret expedition into a mysterious zone where the laws of nature don't apply.

data.Title: Star Trek
data.Writer: Roberto Orci, Alex Kurtzman, Gene Roddenberry (television series "Star Trek")
data.Actors: Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Leonard Nimoy, Eric Bana
data.Plot: The brash James T. Kirk tries to live up to his father's legacy with Mr. Spock keeping him in check as a vengeful Romulan from the future creates black holes to destroy the Federation one planet at a time.

data.Title: The Wizard of Oz
data.Director: Victor Fleming, George Cukor, Mervyn LeRoy, Norman Taurog, King Vidor
data.Writer: Noel Langley (screenplay), Florence Ryerson (screenplay), Edgar Allan Woolf (screenplay), Noel Langley (adaptation), L. Frank Baum (from the book by)
data.Actors: Judy Garland, Frank Morgan, Ray Bolger, Bert Lahr
data.Plot: Dorothy Gale is swept away from a farm in Kansas to a magical land of Oz in a tornado and embarks on a quest with her new friends to see the Wizard who can help her return home to Kansas and help her friends as well.

data.Title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
data.Writer: Ted Elliott (screen story), Terry Rossio (screen story), Stuart Beattie (screen story), Jay Wolpert (screen story), Ted Elliott (screenplay), Terry Rossio (screenplay)
data.Actors: Johnny Depp, Geoffrey Rush, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley
data.Plot: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.
data.Awards: Nominated for 5 Oscars. Another 36 wins & 96 nominations.

data.Title: Rocky
data.Actors: Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Burt Young, Carl Weathers
data.Plot: A small-time boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight a heavy-weight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

data.Title: Jurassic Park
data.Writer: Michael Crichton (novel), Michael Crichton (screenplay), David Koepp (screenplay)
data.Actors: Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum, Richard Attenborough
data.Plot: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

data.Title: Moana
data.Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Musical
data.Director: Ron Clements, John Musker, Don Hall(co-director), Chris Williams(co-director)
data.Writer: Jared Bush (screenplay by), Ron Clements (story by), John Musker (story by), Chris Williams (story by), Don Hall (story by), Pamela Ribon (story by), Aaron Kandell (story by), Jordan Kandell (story by)
data.Actors: Auli'i Cravalho, Dwayne Johnson, Rachel House, Temuera Morrison
data.Plot: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by the Demigod Maui reaches Moana's island, she answers the Ocean's call to seek out the Demigod to set things right.
data.Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 18 wins & 83 nominations.
